sql: SELECT * FROM `ucsb`.`registrar_lectures_undergrad` WHERE (CONCAT(`courseTitle`,' - ',`fullTitle`) = 'GEOG 104 - Physical Geography of the World\'s Oceans');

data.fullTitle: Physical Geography of the World's Oceans
data.description: Introduction to the processes which control the circulation of the world's oceans. Topics include: wind driven circulation, thermohaline circulation, water masses, waves, and tides.
data.preReq: Upper-division standing or consent of instructor.
